issue.title: [CF 72] Slow cooldown updating
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.104, Microsoft Windows NT 6.0.6002 Service Pack 2

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 2.2.3a

Description

When a cooldown resets prematurely, as when a lava burst cooldown resets because of the lava surge talent, it takes a few seconds for it to register the spell as usable. I noticed the older versions of TMW, pre 4.0.1 versions, updated immediately, but I'm not sure what has changed.

comments.body:
This is a side effect of the "Timers ignore GCD" option (In the blizzard interface options panel for TMW). And wow, I just thought of a way to fix this. (I think)

NOTE TO SELF: Instead of returning and doing nothing when on GCD, do a call to set the timer to zero.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Fixed in the next version which should be soon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
